headline: Chubb (CB) Beats Q3 Earnings and Revenue Estimates
summary: Chubb (CB) delivered earnings and revenue surprises of +26.09% and +1.61%, respectively, for the quarter ended September 2025. Do the numbers hold clues to what lies ahead for the stock?

raw.headline: Chubb (CB) Beats Q3 Earnings and Revenue Estimates
raw.summary: Chubb (CB) delivered earnings and revenue surprises of +26.09% and +1.61%, respectively, for the quarter ended September 2025. Do the numbers hold clues to what lies ahead for the stock?

headline: Chubb: Q3 Earnings Snapshot
summary: ZURICH (AP) — Chubb Corp. CB) on Tuesday reported third-quarter earnings of $2.8 billion. On a per-share basis, the Zurich-based company said it had net income of $6.99.

headline: Chubb Reports Third Quarter Net Income Per Share of $6.99, Up 22.6%, and Record Core Operating Income Per Share of $7.49, Up 30.9%; Consolidated Net Premiums Written of $14.9 Billion, Up 7.5%; Record P&C Combined Ratio of 81.8%
summary: Chubb Limited (NYSE: CB) today reported net income for the quarter ended September 30, 2025 of $2.80 billion, or $6.99 per share, and core operating income of $3.00 billion, or $7.49 per share. Book value per share and tangible book value per share increased 4.7% and 6.6%, respectively, from June 30, 2025 and now stand at $182.22 and $120.13. headline: MNK International expands with new broker acquisition in Türkiye
summary: Erhan Ergunes will lead MNK International Türkiye as CEO.
